title: Fiction vs Nonfiction
alt: The real challenge is how to file Boba Fett's biography of Doris Kearns Goodwin.
transcript:
[Cueball is facing Ponytail, and White Hat.]
Cueball: Star Wars?
Ponytail: Fiction.[Cueball is facing Ponytail, and White Hat.]
Cueball: The Making of Star Wars?
White Hat: Nonfiction.[Closeup of Cueball.]
Cueball: Star Wars: The Adventures of Boba Fett?
Ponytail (off-panel): Fiction.[Closeup of Ponytail.]
Cueball (off-panel): Star Wars: The Official Guide to Boba Fett's Armor and Weapons?
Ponytail: Nonfiction, technically.[Cueball is facing Ponytail, and White Hat.]
Cueball: Boba Fett's Gadgets and How He Got Them?
Ponytail: ...Fiction? It depends.[Cueball is facing Ponytail, and White Hat.  Ponytail has turned towards White Hat.]
Cueball: Boba Fett: A Life, by historian Doris Kearns Goodwin?
Ponytail: Hm.
White Hat: Maybe we should just have a Boba Fett section.
